good: ^I know its kinda kinda out of nowhere, but I just wanted to say I really look up to you.
^Growing up in the orchard I could be a nuisance to the other fruit,
^but you would stick up for me when things were tough, and you never asked for anything in return.
^I'm just happy I get to be on a team with you now and return the favor. Thats it, I guess, just... Thanks for being my friend.
^Lemon!! That's so nice, I might cry! Thank *you* for being my friend.
bad: ^I wanted to tell you, you're amazing. Absolutely awe-inspiring. One may even say... awesome.
